data.interest_what: It is to explore the ins and outs of the Entrepreneurship.
data.interest_why: The challenges and problems I have faced during my time with Entrepreneurship have truly energized me in a way that my college career never did.
data.vision_what: My vision is to share all the knowledge I gather.
data.vision_why: I want to help every person feel prepared and fearless to achieve what they set out to do.
data.hobby1_description: I love acoustic songs and have surrounded myself with music for the past 15 years of my life.
data.hobby2_description: I love to play Fifa in my free time and am considered one of the best amongst my friends. While work is great, this helps me spend time with friends.
data.hobby3_what: Laying down and look at the stars
data.hobby3_description: These days it's rare that we take some time out for ourselves and be disconnected. So to remind myself, I sometimes lay down and look at the stars
